attributes.action: Scrutinise the conduct of Boris Johnson MP in respect of his actions
attributes.background: Regarding Mr Johnson's duties as Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs, I am concerned that the frequency of his mistakes in judgement are detrimental to the interests of the United Kingdom's government and its citizens.

rejection.details: The actions and policies of the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs and the Foreign and Commonwealth Office are scrutinised regularly by the House of Commons; for example during Foreign and Commonwealth questions, in debates on foreign policy matters and by the Foreign Affairs Select Committee. We're therefore not exactly sure what further action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take.
